trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ011_02645_SEQ_00<tab>Ansger is worried about the village's water supply.
TEXT_STMBDZ011_02645_TODO_00<tab>Slay three dust anilas for their cores.
TEXT_STMBDZ011_02645_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the anila cores to Ansger.

TEXT_STMBDZ011_02645_ANSGER_000_000<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. You look like you can hold your own in a fight. Would you mind lending me a hand?

TEXT_STMBDZ011_02645_ANSGER_000_001<tab>Once upon a time, Ala Gannha was known for its quarry and the stone it produced. However, a string of problems combined to put an end to that. One such problem facing us right now concerns the local water supply.

TEXT_STMBDZ011_02645_ANSGER_000_002<tab>Quarrying requires huge amounts of water─which becomes awfully dirty in the process. Should this water find its way into the reservoir next to the village, we'd lose our only source of clean drinking water.
TEXT_STMBDZ011_02645_ANSGER_000_003<tab>Although, if we had an anila core or two─make that three─we could easily purify the water.
TEXT_STMBDZ011_02645_ANSGER_000_004<tab>I'd like you to slay three dust anilas and bring back their cores. You should find some to the south.
TEXT_STMBDZ011_02645_ANSGER_000_010<tab>I'd like you to slay three dust anilas and bring back their cores. You should find some to the south.
TEXT_STMBDZ011_02645_ANSGER_000_020<tab>Did you manage to get three cores?
TEXT_STMBDZ011_02645_ANSGER_000_030<tab>Brilliant! These will help us to remove any mineral dust from the water we use when quarrying.

TEXT_STMBDZ011_02645_ANSGER_000_031<tab>In the days before the Empire invaded, the entire village used to go out on anila hunts together to collect their cores. We just don't have the bodies for it now that half of Ala Gannha has been absorbed into the imperial army.
TEXT_STMBDZ011_02645_ANSGER_000_032<tab>That's not to say we'd have any business even if there were more people around. Garlemald only uses metal for its buildings.
TEXT_STMBDZ011_02645_ANSGER_000_033<tab>Never mind that anyway. Thanks for your help, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. It's much appreciated.
